snippet: The Rams drafted Gurley with the 10th pick despite a knee injury. He is now the youngest player to rush for 125 or more yards in three consecutive games since at least 1960.
abstract: Analysis; St Louis Rams rookie running back Todd Gurley, drafted 10th overall despite knee injury, has surprised many with his dominance over last few weeks, rushing 68 times for 43 yards and two touchdowns; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Rams drafted Gurley with the 10th pick despite a knee injury. He is now the youngest player to rush for 125 or more yards in three consecutive games since at least 1960.

headline.print_headline: Out of Operating Room, and Slicing Up Defenses
headline.main: Todd Gurley Rewards St. Louis Rams for Taking a Chance
